Share with Oscar

Redesigning the sharing experience

Oscar is a peer-to-peer marketplace that connects drivers looking for parking spaces with property owners who have empty parking spaces to effectively support a sustainable future through co-living.

Role

Lead Product Design Intern

Team

PM and 2 developers

Timeline

June 2018 - August 2018
